Articles.Content:
since 0.17 was out i started thinking, what would come in the next update???

post your ideas/thougts about 0.18 down below!

my ideas:

-i would like 0.18 to be full with space station features!

-Docking (every space station needs docking)

- a space station command module

-hallways (wich you can walk trough)

-life support (including solar panels)

-Welding parts together (like the iss was)

This should be posted in the suggestions forum though first read the "not what to suggest" stickied post, as some of your ideas are in there. Also make sure to use the search function before you create a topic, as there might already be one about the same.
Docking is not coming in .18 so don't get your hopes up.
